Text:
OK film
good visuals
sound is a bit iffy in places - drops to mono, occasional papery scraping sound
What's up with 24.000 fps? What happened to 23.976? Won't there be some sort of judder converting from Blu-ray 23.976 to 24.000?
Sound isn't just iffy, it's awful. Static in multiple places, and the audio track after 30:00 is off by about 200ms.
